column3: ## Test notes not searchable for fixed query widget (joint journal/article search)

Do a url search for the keyword which is given in a notes for journal,article index. Ex: <host url>/query/journal,article/_search?&source={"query":{"query_string":{"query":"Test Note","default_operator":"AND"}},"size":"20"}&ref=fqw
Modify the search url to add the notes keyword and the default field 'admin.notes.note' and then hit the url
